title: Artistically Bound: Passion in Pittsburgh
description: Creativity & sexual adventure in a whirlwind Pittsburgh romance. Contains the ARTISTICALLY INCLINED Determined not to repeat past mistakes and allow their sex life to become stale and repetitive, Cyndi issues Kevin a Valentine's Day challenge to exchange -- and fulfill -- fantasy lists. His response provides the canvas for an evening of daring inclinations and passionate creativity. BOUND FOR SUCCESS Pittsburgh's daring duo is back in a hot-blooded romance with a penchant for ties that bind! When Cyndi's nerves about her gallery opening get the better of her, Kevin takes matters into his own hands, replacing one tension with another and setting the stage for a very eventful evening. This purchase also entitles you to a digital (ebook) copy of this title.
